text.div:
HSPC Body Weight Associated Precondition

SNOMED CT code system values descending from the following:'body position finding' 9851009

Copyright Statement: TBD

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/observation-hspc-weightPrecond defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
84123 Weight with street clothesBody weight measured while clothed
84124 Weight without street clothesBody weight measured while unclothed
84127 Weight with diapersInfant weight while wearing a diaper
84128 Weight without diapersInfant weight without a diaper
84129 Weight with castBody weight that includes a cast
84130 Weight without castBody weight minus the weight of a cast
84131 Weight with limb prosthesisBody weight including a prosthetic limb
84132 Weight without limb prosthesisBody weight minus the weight of a prosthetic limb
84133 Weight with braceBody weight including a brace
84134 Weight without braceBody weight minus the weight of a brace
84135 Weight with gown or drapeBody weight including a gown or drape
84136 Weight with added-on weightBody weight the includes some other weight
84137 Weight without added-on weightBody weight after subtracting some other included weight

name: HSPC Body Weight Associated Precondition
description: SNOMED CT code system values descending from the following:'body position finding' 9851009

concept.definition: Infant weight while wearing a diaper
Body weight that includes a cast
Body weight minus the weight of a cast
Body weight including a prosthetic limb
Body weight minus the weight of a prosthetic limb
Body weight minus the weight of a brace
Body weight including a gown or drape
Body weight the includes some other weight
Body weight after subtracting some other included weight
